{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS RT-AC1200HP.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Dual-Band Wireless-AC1200 Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Routers/RTAC1200HP/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_RT-AC1200HP |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AC1200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = HP |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTN54U |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = Serial(SPI) |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = AiCloud |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS,ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,,^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/29/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 187 x 145 x 25 mm |weight = 270 g
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612E; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== <small>(HP = High Power)</small>
===Features=== <small> *Gigabit WAN port for high-speed Internet service and connect at speeds 1Gbps *USB port for printer networking, storage sharing, and 3G/4G connections *ASUS AiCloud app to access, sync, share and stream files on the go-quickly *Easy 30 second setup and controls like network monitoring through ASUSWRT *Expanded wireless coverage with high power design </small>
===Specifications=== * Product Segment: AC1200 (300+867 Mbps) * Ports: USB: 1x USB 2.0 : WAN: 1x GbE (RJ45) for 10/100/1000 BaseT : LAN: 4x FE (RJ45) for 10/100 BaseT * Antenna: 4x internal antenna * Operating Frequency: 2.4/5 GHz * Button: WPS, Reset, Power switch, Wireless (On/Off) * Power Supply: : AC Input: 110~240V (50~60Hz) : DC Output: 12V with max. 1A current * Dimensions 187 x 145 x 25 mm (WxDxH) * Weight: 270g
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/new-asus-rt-ac1200hp-rt-ac56s-rt-n56u-v2-wireless-router.22328/ On '''SNB''' forums] (''RTN'') * [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62022-65 On '''iXBT''' forums] (''Padavan & RTN'') : [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RTAC1200HP/ '''Asus RT-AC1200HP'''] AC1200 2T2R 2.4/5GHz :: 802.11n (300Mbps) + 802.11ac (867Mbps) :: MT7620A (802.11n) + MT7612E (802.11ac) :: <del>+ MT7530B (1GbE switch)</del> + P5 > ext. PHY (GbE) :* ASUS RT-AC1200HP: <small>([[ASUS RT-N54U]] + '''AC''' + ext. '''PA/LNA''' ??)</small> :: CPU: [[MediaTek MT7620A]] @580MHz WiSoC :: WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7612E 2T2R 802.11ac :: RAM: 128MB; Flash: SPI; USB: 1x USB 2.0 :* '''[[ASUS RT-N56U B1]]''' (V2): <small>(<del>[[ASUS RT-AC56S]] - ''AC''</del ??>)</small> :: CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621S @880MHz SoC :: WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7603E + MT7612E ('''AC''') !! :: RAM: 128MB; Flash: SPI; USB: 2x USB 2.0 :*'''[[ASUS RT-AC54U]]''' <small>([[ASUS RT-N54U]] + '''AC''' ??)</small>
===[https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/rc/sysdeps/init-ralink.c RMerlin's GitHub]=== * [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/rc/sysdeps/init-ralink.c init-ralink.c] * [https://github.com/RMerl/asuswrt-merlin/blob/master/release/src/router/shared/sysdeps/ralink/mt7620.c mt7620.c]
